name: town-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Town project with web (Astro+React) and API (Node+Express)

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=web && npm run build --workspace=api
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=web && npm run lint --workspace=api
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=web && npm run lint:fix --workspace=api
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=web && npm run type-check --workspace=api
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=web && npm run clean --workspace=api
